sentences.en: Environmentalists fear that this is a short-sighted approach to the problem of global warming.

sentences.en: Global 2000 became an underwriter for small farmers.

sentences.en: Global ecological efforts can easily be at odds with local ecologies.

sentences.en: Global warming is a real problem.
sentences.cn: 全球变暖是个严重的问题。

sentences.en: It is high time to consider the problem on a global scale.
sentences.cn: 早该从全球视角考虑问题了。

sentences.en: It would have to grow by acquisitions or joint ventures to achieve global reach.

sentences.en: Many people are worryingly ignorant of the facts about global warming.

sentences.en: Now that we are all part of the global village, everyone becomes a neighbour.

sentences.en: The commission is calling for a global ban on whaling.

sentences.en: The company does not yet have the global reach of its bigger competitors.
sentences.cn: 该公司还不具备其更大竞争对手那样的国际市场开拓能力。

sentences.en: The crisis here caught the global attention.
